attributes.action: Pledge UK military support in capture of Joseph Kony
attributes.additional_details:
Pledge UK military support in the assistance of capturing and stopping war criminal Joseph Kony. The US have already sent advisers to assist the Ugandan army in the capture of Joseph Kony, the world's number 1 most wanted.

He has abused his power and has caused much cruelty, especially to children and he must be stopped. It is time action is taken, not for defence of ourselves, but for the defence of the defenseless.
